#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
map<int,int>mymap;
int main()
{
	int L = 0, R = 0,t,i,j,k,y,n,num,z[1000005];
	char s[1000005];
	scanf("%d",&k);
	scanf("%s",s);
	scanf("%d",&n);
	for(i=0;i<k;i++)
		z[i]=0;
	L=0;
	R=0;
	for (i=1;i<k;i++) 
	{
  		if (i > R) 
  		{
    		L = R = i;
    		while (R<k && s[R-L] == s[R]) 
    			R++;
    		z[i] = R-L; 
    		R--;
  		} 
  		else 
  		{
    		int l = i-L;
    		if (z[l] < R-i+1) z[i] = z[l];
    		else 
    		{
    			L = i;
      			while (R <k && s[R-L] == s[R]) 
      				R++;
      			z[i] = R-L; 
      			R--;
    		}
  		}
	}
	for(i=0;i<k;i++)
		mymap[z[i]]++;
	if(n==1)
	{
		cout<<k<<endl;
		cout<<s;
	}
	else
	{
		int f=0,st=0;
		n--;
		for(i=1000000;i>=0;i--)
		{
			st+=mymap[i];
			if(st>=n)
			{
				f=i;
				break;
			}
		}
		cout<<f<<endl;
		for(i=0;i<f;i++)
			cout<<s[i];
	}
	return 0;
}
